TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可让您自定义 （或所有者描述） 的外观详细信息视图中的控件。The event lets you customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a control in the details view. 引发事件控制其属性设置为`true`并将其属性设置为。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to `true` and its property is set to . 传递到事件处理程序的信息包含有关绘制还提供了方法，以帮助您绘制标头。The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the header. 使用属性来检索有关要绘制的列标题的信息。Use the property to retrieve information about the column header to draw. 使用属性来进行实际绘制由指定的区域内属性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要绘制标准元素不需要自定义项，使用和方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the and methods. 使用属性时所需操作系统来绘制该子项。Use the property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem. 当你想要自定义仅特定标头时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to customize only specific headers. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免当所有者描述，重写时，图形闪烁的问题控件，并设置属性设置为`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 当应用程序调用，此功能是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列方法。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供有关自定义绘图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 子项并将负值有红色的前景色和背景为黑色。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 处理程序事件绘制的文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 处理程序事件绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. 一个组件提供了一种方法的详细信息视图和列表视图之间进行切换。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，仅触发事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在这种情况下，文本和背景均在事件处理程序。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时处理的标头的不希望以自定义事件。Use this property when handling the event for headers that you do not want to customize. 如果此属性设置为`true`，将像往常一样绘制标头。If you set this property to `true`, the header will be drawn as usual. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
